name: SurveyMonkey New Survey Responses (Last 30 Days)
description: Oversee the number of new responses to your SurveyMonkey survey over the past 30 days. Originates from the Gallery.

zapier-01.name: SurveyMonkey Responses via Zapier
zapier-01.description: Get data on your recent SurveyMonkey survey responses through Zapier. Originates from the Gallery.

datasourceConfigModel.description:
This Klip relies on Zapier to update the data source. After adding the Klip you will need to setup this Zap

Note: When you first add this Klip data will not be shown because the data source is empty. The data begins accumulating once you setup the Zap and includes all new subscribers that are added after that.
